text: Stopover is an unincorporated community in Pike County, Kentucky, United States. It is at the junction of Kentucky Route 194 and Kentucky Route 2062 east of Phelps. Stopover had a post office with ZIP code 41568. Don Blankenship, former CEO of Massey Energy, was born in Stopover. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Kentucky
title: Stopover, Kentucky
